Package org.apache.activemq.broker.scheduler

Interface JobListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SchedulerBroker
    public interface JobListener
    Job event listener interface. Provides event points for Job related events such as job ready events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void scheduledJob​(String id, ByteSequence job)
      A Job that has been scheduled is now ready to be fired.

    • Method Detail

      • scheduledJob

        void scheduledJob​(String id,
                  ByteSequence job)
        A Job that has been scheduled is now ready to be fired. The Job is passed in its raw byte form and must be un-marshaled before being delivered.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique Job Id of the Job that is ready to fire.
        job - The job that is now ready, delivered in byte form.
